Original:
知道經營一間新的酒吧，很辛苦，會給5星，也會提出建議。
1. 調酒基本上偏淡，濃度3星的也很像再喝果汁，加厚要多50元，但也很淡，如果沒有在外面先喝，想要進入微醺的狀況，加厚可能要喝5杯以上，酒量好一點可能要10杯以上。(蠻多間酒吧加厚是不用加費用的)
2. 表演活動時間有點太晚了，12點，所以前面會有很乾跟很空的空窗期，然後12點表演還會有中場休息時間，也會讓客人直接散去，很明顯12點跟1點的人潮就有落差。都已經喝酒，要讓情緒維持很HIGH啊!中間又斷掉，會直接醒。
3. 有包位子的，建議直接先收位子的費用，後面點酒要個人結清，不然人很多，又喝酒，真的很難算帳。
※光這幾點就不太會揪朋友再去一次...
EN:
Knowing that running a new bar is very hard, it will give 5 stars and make suggestions.
1. The bartender is basically lighter, and the concentration of 3 stars is also very similar to drinking fruit juice. It takes 50 yuan to thicken, but it is also very light. If you do n’t drink it outside, if you want to enter the situation, you may be thickened. To drink more than 5 cups, the amount of wine may be more than 10 cups.(There are a lot of bars thicker, no cost is required)
2. The performance time is a bit too late, 12 o'clock, so there will be a very dry and empty window period, and then 12 o'clock in the performance will have a midfielder rest time, which will also let the guests dispersing directly. It is obviously 12 There is a gap with the crowd of 1 point.They have already been drinking, so that the emotions are very high! Break in the middle, they will wake up directly.
3. If there are bags, it is recommended to directly receive the cost of the seat first. If you order the wine, you must settle it individually, otherwise there are many people and drinking. It is really difficult to calculate the account.
※ These points will not be very good at your friends again ...

Original: 這是我們在台北的第一個晚上，我們決定喝點飲料，因為那是週末！老虎（工作人員）非常棒，他對我們這些女孩來說非常平易近人！您也可以在餐桌上唱k！這是一次非常有趣的經驗！我們還通過告訴老虎我們喜歡什麼口味來定制我們自己的雞尾酒，他為我們調製了非常棒的雞尾酒！

We decided to drink some drinks, because it was weekend!Tiger (staff) is great, he is very approachable to us girls!You can also sing K on the table!This is a very interesting experience!We also customized our own cocktails by telling the tiger's taste, and he made a great cocktail for us!

Original: 這個俱樂部有卡拉OK，可以跳舞，酒很好喝。店主是一位善良、英俊、肌肉發達的男人，總是和顧客談論各種話題。另外店主阿妹的歌都唱得很好聽，大家聽吧😆

Original:
週日晚上去的，人很少。
這是一家卡拉 OK 酒吧，所以卡拉 OK 愛好者可以來這裡。非常友好的工作人員會和你聊天，非常可愛。飲料很好喝，我嘗試了他們的特色雞尾酒； 杏蕉成癮是一款非常濃鬱的雞尾酒，香氣濃鬱（工作人員警告我，但我還是想嘗試）。
P/S：他們每週五和週六晚上都有演出。
是在4樓……我只是誤進了1樓。
EN:
There were few people who went on Sunday evening.
This is a karaoke bar, so karaoke enthusiasts can come here.Very friendly staff will chat with you, very cute.The drink is delicious, I tried their special cocktails; apricot banana addiction is a very strong cocktail with a strong aroma (the staff warns me, but I still want to try).
P/S: They perform every Friday and Saturday night.
It's on the 4th floor ... I just went to the first floor by mistake.

Original: 氣氛很好，地方很乾淨，人群也不吵鬧。 Yen和Echo很友善。

Original: 我最近去了這家KTV酒吧，印象深刻！氣氛舒適溫馨，工作人員友善熱情。另外，飲料的價格也很合理。感謝我的朋友的推薦 - 我一定會回來的！
EN: I went to this KTV bar recently, and I was impressed!The atmosphere is comfortable and warm, and the staff is friendly and enthusiastic.In addition, the price of beverages is also reasonable.Thank you for your recommendation -I will definitely come back!
